INSERT INTO STUDY_MEMBER( STUDY_NUM, MEMBER_ID)

mapper.select: SELECT S.STUDY_NUM studyNumber, STUDY_NAME, STUDY_DATE, RECRUIT_END, STUDY_TIME, RECRUIT_PERSON, COUNT(SM.MEMBER_ID) personStatus FROM STUDY S LEFT OUTER JOIN STUDY_MEMBER SM ON S.STUDY_NUM = SM.STUDY_NUM GROUP BY S.STUDY_NUM, STUDY_DATE, RECRUIT_END, STUDY_TIME, RECRUIT_PERSON, STUDY_NAME ORDER BY RECRUIT_END
